--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Roborick im not sure if you forgot or not but Gemini Dragons 
> left head fired a freezing beam at Hotrod...
> 
> Gemini Dragon smirked as the 25 shots by wind lord came at him. A 
> second later three of the 18 small box like things went infront of 
> him. Each then turned into a circle and then the backs elongated 
> before two of them sucked in eight shots and the last one sucked in 
> nine. Gemini Dragon then unleashed 3 highly explosive fireballs at 
> windlord from his right head as well as a blast of electricity from 
> his tail. It then fired another freeze beam(the one that freeze 
what 
> it hits on contact.) at hotrod.
>

inches,
